name: Buzzing to the Hospital
description:
This was a game that i made for a GameJam of 48 hours.  It's really incomplete!!!

I'm new to this time restrictions, being the first game jam i entered i think it went well. I intend of finishing the game in the near future.~

The game is about a bee's journey to a hospital to visit her grandma, who had been injured in an accident. She would persuade the other insects to let her past by using the dances her grandmother had taught her.
